1367000.name: Fantasy Grounds - Referee's Briefing 3: Going Portside
1367000.description:
Referee's Briefing 3: Going Portside

Travellers pass through many starports in their wanderings, and after a while these places can begin to blur into one another. The endless procession of generic bars and hotels, the same shops and tired old d?cor can be soul-destroying. But it does not have to be like that! Referee's Briefing 3: Going Portside presents a miscellany of things to do and places to visit that are both interesting and memorable. Not always for the most positive of reasons but then, you can't have everything...
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and a one time purchase of the Traveller 2E (Mongoose) ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
